SELECT a.anime_id AS animeId, a.title_kor AS titleKor, a.title_english AS titleEng, a.title_romaj AS titleRom, a.title_native AS titleNat, a.cover_image_url AS coverImageUrl, a.trending AS trending, a.popularity AS popularity FROM Anime AS a WHERE 1 = 1
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM AnimeGenres as ag WHERE ag.anime_id = a.anime_id AND ag.genre_id = 19 ) ORDER BY a.trending DESC, a.popularity DESC
